    Function reference

    All functions

    CCT_internal_horizontal()
    Cauchy Combination Test accelerated
    compare_models()
    Use gLRT to compare two models and obtain p values
    compute_infor_mat_tilda()
    compute_information matrix tilda
    estimate_label_default()
    Estimate cell type label for new data
    estimate_label_no_cap_rate_all_pks()
    Estimate cell type label for new data using all peaks as input
    estimate_parameters()
    Estimate parameters for the full model
    estimate_parameters_null()
    Estimate parameters for the null model
    infor_mat()
    Information matrix -- original without Firth prior
    irls_iter()
    Iteratively reweighted least squares function (main function)
    irls_iter_nt()
    Iteratively reweighted least squares function -- newton methods
    irls_iter_nt_null()
    Iteratively reweighted least squares function for null -- newton method for the null model
    irls_iter_null()
    Iteratively reweighted least squares function (main function) for the null model
    loss_firth_from_wii()
    Compute loss function with Firth regularization from Wii matrix
    loss_fun()
    Calculate Loss Function without Firth prior
    loss_fun_star()
    Regularized log loss function
    loss_grad_pen()
    Gradient of penalized loss ( Invariant prior)
    loss_gradient()
    Gradient of loss function without Firth prior
    our_method_no_firth()
    Internal evaluation use only -- PACS Without Firth
    pacs_test_cumu()
    likelihood ratio test with PACS -- cumulative logit
    pacs_test_logit()
    Profile likelihood ratio test with PACS
    pacs_test_sparse()
    Profile likelihood ratio test with PACS
